title: [Get Started with Messaging](/docs/products/messaging/get-started/)
content: Use the core protocol to publish a multichain message and return transaction info with VAA identifiers.

title: [Use Core Contracts](/docs/products/messaging/guides/core-contracts/)
content: Send and receive messages manually, and validate trusted emitters.

title: [Use Wormhole Relayers](/docs/products/messaging/guides/wormhole-relayers/)
content: Send and receive messages without off-chain infrastructure.
